episode.creator: This Week in DAOS
episode.title: This Week in DAOs #002
episode.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
episode.content:
Brian Flynn is a co-founder of Rabbithole, former employee at Dapper Labs & Opensea, and a DAO pioneer.

We talked about:

  • The origins of Rabbithole, and how crypto is going mainstream
  • The future of governance for DAOs
  • How to onboard the next million people to DAOs

Follow Brian on Twitter (@Flynnjamm)
Follow Kohei on Twitter (@koheingt)
Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒
